main event: Witness observed a golden orange object with a black exterior that appeared to be pulsating in Woburn, Massachusetts on November 7, 1962.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 3 to 5 minutes,The object was observed from inside a building during daylight,The object was described as having a solid gray color with black exhaust,The witness experienced a 'weird feeling' of being watched during the encounter,The object slowly disappeared toward the horizon, with no sound reported.
sighted object: golden orange object with a black exterior
witness description: A 23-year-old male machinist and carpenter who reported the sighting to the local police.
